title: Corsair Vengeance a5100 Gaming PC – Liquid Cooled AMD Ryzen™ 7 9800X3D, NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 5090 GPU, 64GB Dominator Titanium RGB DDR5 Memory, 2+2TB M.2 SSD – Black/Silver
description:
About this item
GeForce RTX 50 Series Graphics Card: Powered by NVIDIA Blackwell, GeForce RTX 50 Series GPUs bring game-changing AI capabilities to gamers and creators. Multiply performance with NVIDIA DLSS 4, generate images at unprecedented speed, and unleash your creativity with NVIDIA Studio.
Liquid-Cooled AMD Ryzen 9000 Series Processor: Powers smooth gameplay and high frame rates across a wide range of titles for avid gamers. With exceptional single-threaded and multi-threaded performance, professional content creators can now harness the full potential by enabling users to design, render, and iterate faster than ever before.
CORSAIR iCUE LINK 2500X RGB Dual Chamber Case: Offers stunning views of your PC’s internals through tempered glass panels, along with impressive cooling performance from side, rear, roof, and bottom fans.
CORSAIR iCUE LINK TITAN RX RGB Liquid CPU Cooler: Delivers high-performance, ultra-quiet cooling with optimized thermal performance, streamlined iCUE LINK connectivity, and dynamic RGB lighting.
9x CORSAIR iCUE LINK RX120 RGB Fans: Features Magnetic Dome bearing for quiet operation and AirGuide technology for concentrated cooling to keep your VENGEANCE PC running at peak efficiency.

title: 550lb Bathroom Digital Scale for Body Weight with Ultra-Wide Platform and Large LCD Display, Accurate High Precision Scale with Extra-High Capacity
description:
Brand	runstar
Color	Blue-black
Recommended Uses For Product	Humans
Special Feature	High Weight Capacity
Display Type	LCD
About this item
Where Capacity Meets Precision Equipped with specialized load cells, this RunStar digital scale up to an extra high capacity (550lb /250kg). Which have passed 100,000 times sensor performance tests, delivering accurate readings in 1lb /0.5kg increments
Easy to Read The extra wide LCD display provides much bigger numbers than others, helping you to read it clearly without bending over. Feel free to place it in your bathroom, living room or any other places you want
Room to Weigh it All This high capacity scale adopts an extra large platform (300 x 330mm) , providing enough room and comfort to accommodate you and your family, even allowing you to weigh with your child comfortably and securely
Safety Ensured for the Whole Family As we are always committed to Safety First, this scale for body weight is designed with durable 8mm tempered glass and anti-slip silicone feet to ensure every safe and stable weighing experience
Weigh for 90 Days Per Battery Change The scale features with a low-consumption IC chip that can save energy and prolong the battery life, which enables 3-month weighing per battery change. It comes with Three 1.5V AAA batteries

title: BulkSupplements.com Creatine Monohydrate Powder
description:
About this item
Maximize your Potential: Enhance your active lifestyle with our Creatine Monohydrate powder, in Micronized Creatine powder, designed to support your strength and performance goals. Each serving delivers a substantial 5 grams dose, catering to both fitness enthusiasts looking to push their limits.
